title: Short SMC
message:
This board is not liquide damage. I found short smc that I replaced and now I have green light and ppbus at 12.54V
3V estables but 5V pulsing each 6 seg. CPU core pulsing too. Could be bad donor-SMC or something else?

title: Short SMC
message:
Check all S0 lines for a short to ground.

With short SMC I assume you meant PP3V42_G3H? Is the voltage of this stable?

title: Short SMC
message: Yes, 3V42 was shorted because of SMC. After replaced, this rail is stable.

title: Short SMC
message: So how are the S0 lines doing, no shorts?

title: Short SMC
message: Great to know what board this is. Also great to know the history, SMC does not "just" short.

title: Short SMC
message:
820-3115
Customer says that one day it just dont power anymore. No short on coils.

title: Short SMC
message: I replaced the SMC again and same thing. Pulsing each 6 seg.

title: Short SMC
message: Could be anything and the customer is lying. CPU Vcore also pulsing?

title: Short SMC
message: Cpu vcore also pulsing. Now told me that fan run fast last time and opened the laptop to replace the cpu compound and clean the fan.

title: Short SMC
message: So it could be anything. Check for knocked off components.

title: Short SMC
message:
History:
Other guy replaced the isl6259 but he burnt both mosfets someway. So, I think in some time ppbus recived 20V directly from ac adapter if upper mosfet was burnt firstly.
Can that burn some component on ppbus?

title: Short SMC
message: Now it can be anything and everything. Rabbit hole.....avoid.

title: Short SMC
message:
Ok, told me he power the board without isl6259
This damaged both mosfets, low and upper. But this can damage more things?

title: Short SMC
message: I really have no idea, this was just fucked with and everything could be wrong.
